plot_summary: Mina takes her first solo subway trip to Hongdae, meticulously preparing but feeling overwhelmed by anxiety. As she travels, she becomes increasingly disoriented by the speed of the passing stations and fears she may have already missed her destination.
open_threads: Whether Mina has truly missed her destination or if her anxiety is misleading her.
The successful or unsuccessful completion of Mina's first solo subway journey.
Mina's ability to overcome her growing panic and navigate the subway system independently.
